title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets          Cape Cod National Seashore, and some neighboring towns, require that pets be leashed at all times. Specific areas where pets are prohibited are posted. Ask at seashore visitor centers or ranger stations about restrictions that apply. Here is a link to a brochure about Cape Cod National Seashore's pet policy.
